post.title: About Me
post.content:
Hi, my name is Bacardi Bryant and I have developing applications using Microsoft .NET technologies and ColdFusion for eight years.

I live in Spring, Texas with my wife and now 3 year old son. When I am not coding, I enjoy watching my son run around the play area at the Woodlands Mall and listening to my wife save the world.

This blog is my small contribution to the .NET community.

Any questions are comments are welcomed.
